articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Tuesday received a message of greeting from Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic.
					 Bashar Al-Assad in his message extended the most heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK on behalf of the Syrian Arab people and on his own behalf. The message wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people bigger progress and prosperity.
					
					 The message affirmed that the Syrian Arab Republic will continue to boost the friendly and cooperative relations with the DPRK in the common interests of the friendly peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Nigerian President
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Muhammadu Buhari, president and commander-in-chief of the Armed Forces of Nigeria, on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The charge d'affaires ad interim of the Nigerian embassy here handed the floral basket to an official concerned Wednesday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps Here
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Diplomatic Corps Here
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps here on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The floral basket and letter were handed over to Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK who is doyen of the corps, Wednesday.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Officials Visit Moranbong Secondary School No.1
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Visit Moranbong Secondary School No.1
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Jesus De Los Angeles Aise Sotolongo, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials visited Moranbong Secondary School No.1 on Wednesday on the occasions of the 91st birth anniversary of Fidel Castro Ruz and the month of solidarity with the Cuban people.
					 Being briefed on the fact that its schoolchildren are being trained into competent talents and pillars of thriving Korea fully prepared mentally, morally and physically, they went round a room dedicated to the history of the school and classroom "Jose Marti Class" and other places.
					
					 They appreciated drawings of students representing the friendship between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 Earlier, they did friendly labor at the DPRK-Cuba Friendship Farm.

articles.title: Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Tours Korean Revolution Museum
articles.content:
Economic and Commercial Councilors Corps Tours Korean Revolution Museum
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The economic and commercial councilors corps here visited the Korean Revolution Museum on Wednesday on the occasion of the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: Contributors to Successful H-bomb Test Greeted by Pyongyangites
articles.content:
Contributors to Successful H-bomb Test Greeted by Pyongyangites
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Contributors to the successful test of H-bomb for ICBM arrived here on Wednesday.
					 They were greeted in front of the Tree-Revolution Exhibition House by Ri Man Gon, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and other officials of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 Along the routes of streets Pyongyangites gave warm welcome to the contributors, waving flags of the DPRK, red flags and bouquets.
					
					 The contributors visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to make a report about their success and vow to successfully conclude their research and development campaign to attain the final-phase goals for perfecting the state nuclear force advanced at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, true to the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Army-People Meeting Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Army-People Meeting Held in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- A Pyongyang city army-people rally took place at Kim Il Sung Square Wednesday to celebrate the successful ICBM-ready H-bomb test conducted under the strategic plan of the Workers' Party of Korea for bolstering the nuclear force.
					 Attending it were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairman of a friendly party, contributors to the successful ICBM-ready H-bomb test, officials of party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and officials of institutions at all levels and industrial establishments in the city of Pyongyang.
					
					 Congratulatory speeches were made by Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and premier of the Cabinet; Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK; Air Force General O Kum Chol, vice-chief of the General Staff of the KPA; and Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the C.C., Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League.
					
					 The speakers stressed that the successful test in super-powerful thermonuclear weapon serves as a gift to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and an auspicious national event that gave great courage and strength to the Korean army and people.
					
					 They said it is thanks to the energetic guidance and tireless devotion and efforts of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un that the DPRK could emerge a nuclear weapons state of Juche, a world military power.
					
					 The unprecedented feats for building the nuclear force performed by him, who has won victories through successive strong attacks on the U.S. styling itself the "only superpower" and its vassal forces before they come to their senses, will shine forever along with the victorious advance of the Korean revolution, they said.
					
					 The invincible revolutionary Paektusan army will put an end to the destiny of the gangster-like U.S. imperialists through the most merciless and strongest preemptive strikes if they and the hordes of traitors finally ignite a war, faulting the entirely just self-defensive measures of the DPRK for bolstering its nuclear deterrent, they stressed.
					
					 Fireworks were displayed in the sky above Pyongyang at the end of the meeting.

articles.title: Korean People Hail Successful H-bomb Test for ICBM
articles.content:
Korean People Hail Successful H-bomb Test for ICBM
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are unanimous in saying that the successful test of H-bomb for ICBM followed by the test-launches of ICBM Hwasong-14 in July is a nuclear thunder of justice which was inflicted on the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces.
					 Ri Phyong Thaek, a workshop head of the Chollima Steel Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 I have a great pride at the news of a special event before the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 The successful test of H-bomb is an auspicious event of the Korean nation that humbled again the U.S. imperialists and other hostile forces threatening the sovereignty and the rights to existence and development of the DPRK. It is also an exciting event produced by the Workers' Party of Korea's line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 The fighting trait of scientists in the field of defence science encourages workers in the field of metallurgical industry to perform feats.
					
					 Ko Hyok Chol, first secretary of the youth league committee of the State Academy of Sciences, said:
					
					 The successful H-bomb test is a remarkable demonstration of our self-development-first spirit and a manifestation of the tremendous national power the enemy cannot calculate and analyze.
					
					 Picturing to myself the U.S., the cursed state of aggression, being submerged in a sea of fire by our H-bomb-loaded ICBM for its slightest provocation, I can not repress my excitement.
					
					 As the scientists in the field of defence science did, we, young scientists, will do our best to make more ultra-modern scientific researches to put the national economy on a Juche basis.

articles.title: Voluntary Teachers Welcomed
articles.content:
Voluntary Teachers Welcomed
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Central Youth Hall on Tuesday to congratulate the teachers who volunteered to work at branch schools on islands and schools in forefront line and mountainous areas.
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, officials concerned, officials in the field of education, teachers who volunteered to work at branch schools on islands and schools in forefront line and mountainous areas and teachers and students of universities and other schools in the city.
					
					 Choe made a speech about the gifts sent to the voluntary teachers by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The gifts reflect the Supreme Leader's wishes to see the volunteers invariably keep their pledge to the Party and the country and train the rising generations into reliable heirs to prosperous Korea, Choe said.
					
					 Party and state commendations were conferred on exemplary teachers at the meeting.
					
					 Then, congratulatory speeches were made before resolution speeches by volunteers.
					
					 The speakers expressed the strong will to devote all their wisdom and energy to the education of rising generations so as to train them into reliable pillars of prosperous Korea faithful to the Supreme Leader.

articles.title: Media Persons Make Study Tour of Mt Paektu Area
articles.content:
Media Persons Make Study Tour of Mt Paektu Area
Samjiyon, September 6 (KCNA) -- Media persons from across the country made a study tour of the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu from August 29 to September 6.
					 Arriving in Pochonbo, they laid bouquets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung and paid tribute to him.
					
					 They went round various places such as the Pochonbo Revolutionary Museum, the command post of the Battle of Pochonbo, fire station and other parts.
					
					 They toured the Spring Site in Poso-ri, Junghung Plateau Monument and Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, etc.
					
					 They vowed to display the might of ideological campaign in the general advance for the building of a socialist power before the statue of leader Kim Jong Il in Samjiyon County.
					
					 Before climbing up Mt Paektu, they visited the Samjiyon Revolutionary Museum and the Samtogong log cabin where Kim Jong Il spent a night together with the members of the tour group on June 9, Juche 45 (1956).
					
					 They reached the birthplace of Kim Jong Il in the Paektusan Secret Camp after touring Soyonji Peak, Kanbaeksan and Mudubong Bivouacs. They were briefed on the poem "Shining Star", written by Kim Il Sung to mark Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary, before the monument inscribed with it and looked round the secret camp.
					
					 During the study tour, they visited Chongbong, Konchang and Mupho Bivouacs, the Sinsadong Revolutionary Battle Site, the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Musan Area and the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station.
					
					 And they conducted various political and cultural activities including meetings to hear impressions of the reminiscences of anti-Japanese guerrillas, a contest of singing revolutionary songs in chorus, quick writing contests under the theme of the revolutionary tradition, and sports games.
					
					 They held a meeting to vow their pledge before the Samjiyon Grand Monument.

articles.title: Jong Jin Man, Promising Weightlifter of DPRK
articles.content:
Jong Jin Man, Promising Weightlifter of DPRK
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- Jong Jin Man, a weightlifter of the Kigwancha Sports Team in the DPRK, attracts attention of experts as a promising weightlifter.
					 He established new records in snatch, jerk and total of men's above 65kg category at the recent juvenile championships.
					
					 He already set new records in the three events of above 65kg at the juvenile championships last year and the 54th national sports contest of juvenile sports schools this year.
					
					 He began to learn weightlifting at the age of 11 at juvenile sports school.
					
					 He snatched 22 gold medals and two silvers in all.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kyonghung Restaurant Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kyonghung Restaurant Marked
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held on Wednesday to mark the 30th anniversary of the Kyonghung Restaurant.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il personally chose a site for the restaurant and dispatched a powerful force for its construction. And he visited the excellently built restaurant on Sept. 7, Juche 76 (1987), indicating specific ways for its service and operation.
					
					 The restaurant has faithfully served citizens for the past three decades, true to the Party's politics of love for the people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Rubbish
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Rubbish
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are raising a hue and cry over "simultaneously promoting the solution of north's nuclear issue and the development of south-north relations" in a bid to mislead the public opinion.
					 The chief executive of south Korea spouted rhetoric that the history of "the north's nuclear issue" shows only when the "sanctions were accompanied by dialogue there opened a way of settling the issue". At a seminar that followed the work report by the foreign ministry and the unification ministry, he asserted that "the efforts for denuclearization and improvement of the south-north relations have to play a mutually supplementary role".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary ridicules this as a foolish action of those who do not know where they stand and as a silly talk that can not work on anyone.
					
					 It says:
					
					 It is a lesson of history that the south Korean authorities' persistent moves for "solution of the north's nuclear issue" would make the north-south relations complicated and totally bankrupt in the end.
					
					 However, they are talking about "simultaneous promotion of the solution of the north's nuclear issue and the development of south-north relations". This is no more than the height of stupidity and ignorance as they fail to understand the cause and essence of the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula and the main obstacle lying in the way of improving the north-south relations.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should stop such wordplays. If they persist in such rhetoric, they would follow in the footsteps of traitor Park Geun Hye who met a miserable end after failing to have proper dialogue with the DPRK during her office.
					
					 They should behave themselves, mindful of this.

articles.title: U.S. Sanctions and Pressure Never Work on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Sanctions and Pressure Never Work on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- It is the conclusion once again drawn by the international community that the U.S. sanctions and muscle-flexing only boomerang on it, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					 Attention of the international community was focused on respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's recent visit to an institute in the field of defence science, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Experts claim it is very important for the DPRK to pay special attention to putting the defence industry on a Juche basis. They also comment that the nuclear deterrent of the DPRK is so valuable that it will never abandon it, no matter what pressure, ultimatum and temptation it faces.
					
					 Missile experts of the West are skeptical whether even a country possessed of "dual and triple" interceptor systems can intercept ultra-modern ballistic rockets of the DPRK simultaneously and successively launched under waters and on the ground.
					
					 The Trump administration should have a correct understanding of the actual power of the DPRK.
					
					 It is a tragedy that the U.S. and its lackeys are still pinning hope on sanctions and military option. But clear is the fact that the more recklessly the U.S. resorts to irrational sanctions, pressure and military threats to the DPRK, the more rapidly the defence capability of Juche Korea will develop beyond the world's imagination.
					
					 The perfect success in the H-bomb test for ICBM that shook the earth is its eloquent proof.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Busy with North-targeted Naval Maneuver
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Busy with North-targeted Naval Maneuver
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean forces are busy with war maneuvers targeting the DPRK, further coiling up the tension on the Korean peninsula, according to the south Korean Yonhap News on Tuesday.
					 On September 4 the warmongers of the navy's First Fleet conducted an anti-submarine drill with submarines and helicopters involved in the East Sea of Korea. On September 5 they frantically waged a drill for naval bombardment with mobilization of escort craft, patrol craft, guided-missile high-speed ship, high-speed boat and others. 
					
					 The puppet forces are mulling expanding this saber-rattling to the South Sea of Korea.
					
					 The warmongers of the Third Fleet also plan to stage four-day large-scale war maneuvers.
					
					 In this period they are going to conduct an anti-submarine drill in the East Sea of Korea with sea-patrol planes of the U.S. aggressor forces.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- The Print Poligraph Publishing House of Russia brought out in booklet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Young People, Be Vanguard Fighters Who Are Unfailingly Faithful to the Party's Revolutionary Cause of Songun" on August 28, the Youth Day in the DPRK.
					 The work, published on September 18, Juche 103 (2014), says that the Korean youths have covered a glorious course, adding luster to the annals of the revolution with their heroic exploits and proud victory under the wise guidance and benevolent loving care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It indicates the tasks and ways for the Korean youths to creditably play their role in the ongoing advance as the youth vanguard of the Party.

articles.title: Founding Anniversary of DPRK to Be Marked in Peru
articles.content:
Founding Anniversary of DPRK to Be Marked in Peru
Pyongyang, September 6 (KCNA) -- A Peruvian preparatory committee for celebrating the 69th founding anniversary of the DPRK was formed on August 23.
					 Tani Baler Lopera, international secretary of the Communist Party of Peru "Red Motherland", was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events, including celebration meeting and film show, ahead of the founding anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores del presidente nigeriano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores del presidente nigeriano
Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que le enviara Muhammadu Buhari, Presidente de la Republica Federal de Nigeria y Comandante en Jefe de las Fuerzas Armadas de Nigeria, con motivo del 69o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					El encargado de negocios a.i. de Nigeria en Corea lo traslado el dia 6 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Militares y habitantes capitalinos felicitan exitosa prueba de bomba H
articles.content:
Militares y habitantes capitalinos felicitan exitosa prueba de bomba H
Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 6 en la Plaza Kim Il Sung el mitin de los militares y habitantes de la ciudad de Pyongyang para felicitar la exitosa prueba de la bomba H para instalar en el cohete balistico intercontinental, realizada segun el proyecto del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sobre la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares estrategicas.
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente del partido amigo, los contribuyentes al evento historico, los funcionarios del Partido, las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones, fabricas y empresas a todos niveles en esta capital y otros.
					
					Los discursos de felicitacion fueron pronunciados por el premier Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC, Choe Thae Bok, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del CC del PTC, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas aereas O Kum Chol, subjefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, y Jon Yong Nam, primer secretario del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista. 
					
					Los oradores dijeron que la prueba exitosa de la arma termonuclear superpoderosa deviene el regalo dedicado al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y el gran acontecimiento de la nacion que multiplica la confianza y el coraje del ejercito y pueblo de Corea.
					
					La RPDC se convirtio en la potencia nuclear del Juche y la militar de talla mundial, lo cual deviene el evento milagroso logrado por la direccion y los incansables esfuerzos fisicos y mentales del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, subrayaron.
					
					Prosiguieron que brillaran para siempre junto con el avance victorioso de la revolucion coreana las hazanas sin precedentes acumuladas en la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares por el Maximo Dirigente quien siempre sale victorioso dando sucesivos ataques y golpes duros a EE.UU., que se autodenomina como "superpotencia unica", y sus satelites.
					
					Si los yanquis y la banda de traidores surcoreanos intentan desatar por fin la guerra cuestionando las justas medidas autodefensivas por la consolidacion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC, el poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu asestara el golpe preventivo mas implacable para poner fin al destino del imperio norteamericano, concluyeron.
					
					Terminado el mitin, se aparecieron los fuegos artificiales en el cielo de Pyongyang.

articles.title: Llegan a Pyongyang los contribuyentes a la exitosa prueba de bomba H
articles.content:
Llegan a Pyongyang los contribuyentes a la exitosa prueba de bomba H
Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Llegaron el dia 6 a esta capital los contribuyentes a la exitosa prueba de la bomba H para instalar en el cohete balistico intercontinental.
					Ri Man Gon, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y otros funcionarios del CC del PTC acogieron a los cientificos de defensa nacional en la explanada frente a la Exposicion Permanente de las Tres Revoluciones.
					
					Cuando los autobuses aparecieron en las avenidas capitalinas, los trabajadores les dieron bienvenidas agitando las banderas nacionales, las banderas rojas y las ramitas florales.
					
					Llegados a la colina Mansu donde estan erguidas las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, los contribuyentes dieron el parte de la victoria a los grandes lideres y tomaron un juramento de quedar fieles a la direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y terminar la campana de investigacion y desarrollo para alcanzar la meta de la etapa final del perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, presentada por el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.

articles.title: Efectuado acto para felicitar a maestros que solicitaron el trabajo en los lugares dificiles
articles.content:
Efectuado acto para felicitar a maestros que solicitaron el trabajo en los lugares dificiles
Pyongyang, 6 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto para felicitar a los maestros quienes solicitaron a trabajar voluntariamente en las escuelas halladas en islotes, la zona del frente avanzado y las montanas apartadas.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Choe Thae Bok, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion, los funcionarios la rama interesada y la educativa, los maestros mencionados, los profesores y estudiantes de las universidades y escuelas a todos los niveles de esta capital.
					
					Choe Thae Bok pronuncio el discurso de entrega de los regalos del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un para los educadores voluntarios.
					
					El orador dijo que en los regalos del Maximo Dirigente esta impregnado de su noble proposito de que los maestros voluntarios formen a los miembros de la nueva generacion como los fidedignos sucesores de la Corea prospera cumpliendo asi el juramento tomado ante el partido y la patria.
					
					En el acto hubo condecoracion del partido y el Estado a los profesores ejemplares.
					
					A la continuacion, hubo discursos de felicitacion e intervenciones de decision de los educadores voluntarios.
					
					Los oradores expresaron determinaciones de dedicar todo lo suyo a los trabajos de la educacion para los miembros de la nueva generacion y formarlos como dignos trabajadores de la Corea prospera, infinitamente fieles al Maximo Dirigente.

articles.title: Sancion y presion de EE.UU. no saldran con la suya en la RPDC, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Sancion y presion de EE.UU. no saldran con la suya en la RPDC, apunta Rodong Sinmun
yongyang, 6 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La sociedad internacional volvio a llegar a una conclusion de que la campana de sancion y la ilusion de resolucion militar de EE.UU. no son mas que una fanfarronada suicida.
					Ahora, la sociedad internacional expresa la atencion especial a la noticia de que el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un dirigio sobre terreno un instituto de la rama cientifica de defensa nacional.
					
					Asi inicia el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este martes y prosigue:
					
					Los especialistas insisten en que es muy importante prestar atencion especial a que la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea enfatiza en la jucheanizacion de la industria para la defensa nacional.
					
					Y evaluan que la RPDC tiene el disuasivo nuclear tan valioso, que nunca puede ser renunciado doblegandose ante cualesquiera presiones o ultimatum o seduccion.
					
					Los especialistas occidentales de la rama de misiles expresan la duda de que aunque un pais tiene el doble o triple sistema antimisiles, pudiera interceptar los cohetes balisticos ultramodernos de la RPDC lanzados de manera sucesiva y simultanea en el mar y el cielo.
					
					La administracion Trump debe tener la correcta comprension sobre las irrefutables fuerzas militares de la RPDC.
					
					Es una tragicomedia el hecho de que EE.UU. y sus lacayos depositan todavia una esperanza vana en la sancion y la opcion militar.
					
					Cuanto mas EE.UU. recurra imprudentemente a la sancion y presion y la amenaza y chantaje militares anti-RPDC, tanto mas se fortalecera incesantemente la capacidad de defensa nacional de caracter autodefensivo de la Corea de Juche con una velocidad inimaginable por el mundo.
					
					Lo comprueba elocuentemente el exito de la RPDC logrado en la prueba de bomba de hidrogeno para instalar en el cohete balistico intercontinental.
